summary: This document is an email from Jes Staley to Jeffrey Epstein thanking him for his support of the NY Hall of Science fundraiser. Staley expresses gratitude for Epstein's friendship and generosity, indicating that his contributions were significant to the event's success.

persons.name: Jes Staley
persons.context: Jes Staley is the Chairman of Corporate and Investment Bank at JP Morgan, who expresses gratitude to Epstein for his support of a fundraising event.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is acknowledged for his friendship and generosity in supporting the NY Hall of Science fundraiser.

connections.description: Jes Staley thanks Jeffrey Epstein for his friendship and support of a fundraising event, indicating a personal relationship.

events.title: NY Hall of Science Fundraiser
events.description: Jes Staley thanks Jeffrey Epstein for his contributions to the NY Hall of Science fundraiser, which was a success due to his support.

keyFacts: Jes Staley expresses gratitude to Jeffrey Epstein for his support of the NY Hall of Science fundraiser.
The fundraiser was described as a great success, attributed in part to Epstein's contributions.
The email indicates a personal relationship between Staley and Epstein.
